column1: Increase Number of Products in Basket Test
column21:
*Test Objective:* To verify that the number of products in the basket increases correctly when products are added.

*Test Steps:*

# Navigate to the product catalog subpage.
# Add a product to the basket.
# Navigate to the basket subpage.
# Increase number of product previously added
# Refresh the page
# Verify the updated number of products in the basket.

*Expected Result:* The number of products in the basket should increase. The updated number should be reflected accurately on the basket subpage.

*Test objective:* To verify that a registered user can successfully login to the website 

*Test steps:*

# Navigate to the login page
# Enter valid username and invalid password
# Click on the login button 

*Expected result:* The “Wrong Password“ message should appear.

*Test objective:* To verify that a registered user can successfully login to the website 

*Test steps:*

# Navigate to the login page
# Enter invalid username
# Click on the login button 

*Expected result:* The “Wrong Username“ message should appear.

column1: Adding Product to Basket from Product Subpage Test
column21:
*Test objective:* To verify that the user is able to add a product from a poduct subpage to the basket successfully.

*Test steps:*

# Load the product subpage.
# Click on a product
# Click on the "Add to Basket" button.
# Navigate to the basket subpage. 

*Expected result:* The product should be added to the basket and the basket subpage should reflect the added product.

*Test objective:* To verify that the Product Subpage loads correctly

*Test steps:*

# Load the product subpage.
# Click on a product
# Wait for the Product Subpage to load completely.

*Expected result:* Product Subpage is displayed correctly

*Test objective:* To verify if a product can be removed from the basket.

*Test steps:*

# Navigate to the product subpage.
# Click on the "Add to Basket" button.
# Navigate to the basket subpage.
# Click on the "Trash" button next to the added product.

*Expected result*: The product should be removed from the basket

Test objective:* To verify that the user is able to add a product to the basket successfully.

*Test steps:*

# Load the product subpage.
# Click on the "Add to Basket" button.
# Navigate to the basket subpage. 

*Expected result:* The product should be added to the basket and the basket subpage should reflect the added product.

*Test objective:* To verify that the Basket Subpage loads correctly

*Test steps:*

# Open the Main Page in a web browser.
# Click on “Basket“ link in the navigation bar.
# Wait for the Basket Subpage to load completely.

*Expected result:* Basket Subpage is displayed correctly

*Test objective:* To verify if a new user account can be successfully created on the website. Test steps:

*Test steps:*

# Launch the website
# Make sure that you are not logged in
# Click on the "Create Account" link on the navigation bar.
# Enter valid information into all required fields on the account creation form.
# Submit the form by clicking the "Create account" button with a link.
# Verify that the user is redirected to the account page after successful account creation

*Expected result:*

* The user should be able to successfully create a new account on the website.

column1: Load Create Account Subpage and check if it is linked Test
column21:
*Test objective:* To verify that the Create Account subpage is present on the website and user can acces it

*Test steps:*

# Launch the website
# Make sure that you are not logged in
# Click on the "Login" link in the navigation bar
# Click on the “Create account“ button with a link
# Check if the Create Account subpage is loaded

*Expected result:* The Create Account subpage should be present on the website and should be loaded successfully.

*Test objective:* To verify if the filter logic is working properly and filtering products based on selected checkboxes and price range.

*Test steps:*

# Open the product catalog subpage
# Check some of the filter options (e.g. man, jeans, etc.)
# Select a price range
# Click on the 'Filter' button
# Verify that the products displayed on the page have been filtered based on the selected options and price range
# Check if the filtered products are displayed correctly, including their name, image, description, and price

*Expected result:* The products displayed on the page should be filtered based on the selected options and price range. The filtered products should be displayed correctly, including their name, image and price.

*Test objective:* To verify if the filter UI is present on the product catalog subpage 

*Test steps:*

# Navigate to the product catalog subpage
# Look for the filter UI on the page 

*Expected result:* The filter UI should be present on the product catalog subpage

*Test objective:* To verify that the user can successfully load the product catalog subpage 

*Test steps:*

# Open the Main Page
# Click on the "Cloth" link in the navigation bar
# Wait for the product catalog subpage to load

*Expected result:* The product catalog subpage should load without any errors or delays

*Test objective:* To verify that user can successfully logout from the website. 

*Test steps:*

# Navigate to the website and log in using valid username and password.
# Click on the logout link.
# Verify that the user is logged out.

*Expected result:* User should be successfully logged out of the website and should not be able to access any secure pages or features.

*Test objective:* To verify that a registered user can successfully login to the website 

*Test steps:*

# Navigate to the login page
# Enter valid login credentials (username and password)
# Click on the login button 

*Expected result:* The user should be redirected to the account subpage of the website and a message with user username should be located on the navigation bat

*Test objective:* To verify that the Login and Account subpages are loading without any errors or issues.

*Test steps:*

# Open the web application.
# Click on the "Login" link in the navigation bar.
# Check that the Login subpage is loaded successfully and without any errors.
# Click on the "Create Account" link in the Login subpage.
# Check that the Account subpage is loaded successfully and without any errors.

*Expected result:*

# The web application loads successfully.
# The "Login" link in the navigation bar is clickable.
# The Login subpage is loaded successfully and without any errors.
# The "Create Account" link in the Login subpage is clickable.
# The Account subpage is loaded successfully and without any errors.

*Test objective:* To verify that the navigation bar has loaded on the webpage.

*Test steps:*

# Open the web page in a web browser.
# Look for the navigation bar element on the webpage.
# Verify that the navigation bar is visible and displayed correctly.

*Expected result:* The navigation bar should be visible and displayed correctly on the webpage.

column21:

*Test steps:*

# Open the main page in a web browser.
# Wait for the main page to load completely.

*Expected result:* main page is displayed correctly
